last_episode_to_air.name: This can't be all there is to life
last_episode_to_air.overview: With a new motorcycle, Cassandra tries to make up for lost time and money to go to her son's party. Gersinho uses his gift money to buy Cassandra a present. She introduces her son to her chosen family. For the first time, Cassandra considers looking for her mother.

name: September Mornings
overview: The journey of Cassandra, who starts to see things get on track in her life with a place of her own for the first time, a boyfriend who she loves, Ivaldo, a job as a courier in downtown São Paulo, and fulfilling her dream of being a cover artist of Vanusa, a famous Brazilian singer from the 70s. Her life takes an unexpected turn, however, when her ex, Leide, shows up with Gersinho and claims he is Cassandra’s son.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Cassandra reunites with her father after a decade, and finds a loving man eager to reconnect with his daughter and her new family. As her beliefs fade into thin air, she will try to figure out what kind of woman, mother, daughter and girlfriend she wants to be. During this search, Gersinho, the boy who caused the tsunami in her life, will also be her life boat and source of joy.

episodes.name: Just For Tonight
episodes.overview: Cassandra is an independent trans woman who works as a delivery app motorbike courier and singer in drag shows impersonating Vanusa. She has a steady relationship with Ivaldo and just rented a studio apartment. Finally a place of her own! But her unheard-of son shows up unexpectedly, turning Cassandra’s world upside down. After rejecting Gersinho and Leide, she finds out they’re homeless.

episodes.name: Stop Calling Me Dad!
episodes.overview: Cassandra takes Leide and Gersinho in for the night, but Leide begs her to let them stay. She gives them two days but rejects the boy who insists on calling her “dad”. Worse yet, Decio and Aristides stop by to meet the boy. Feeling that her life and freedom have been stolen, she takes refuge at her friend Roberta’s place. Meanwhile, Ivaldo wants to surprise her and finds out she has a son.

episodes.name: Gersinho
episodes.overview: Cassandra is alone with Gersinho while Leide is looking for a job. She tries to get closer to Ivaldo who is upset because she never mentioned she had a son. She’s on the edge. But a gesture from Gersinho makes her feel connected to him. Meanwhile, Leide sleeps with a man on Cassandra’s bed. She catches them, throws Leide out and tells her to stay out of her life and take the boy with you.

episodes.name: Take It Or Leave It
episodes.overview: Cassandra and Ivaldo make up but argue upon realizing they’ve been together for a year. Decio and Aristides take Leide and Gersinho in. Leide starts helping Ari at a charity bazaar and steals clothes in order to pay for a boarding house. Cassandra rescues Gersinho and Ari from a bar brawl and gets closer to her son, but falls apart after Leide reveals a transphobic attitude.

episodes.name: That's Right, Baby, Enjoy!
episodes.overview: Cassandra wants to forget Ivaldo and has a party while he tries to reconnect with his family. Ari finds out Leide stole and kicks her out. Gersinho stays with a friend and Leide is back on the streets. Gersinho is chosen to represent the school in a math tournament out of town. Leide and Cassandra join forces for the first time to help Gersinho get to the tournament.

episodes.name: Oh, the family life... What a bore
episodes.overview: On the way back from Gersinho's math contest, their car breaks down and Cassandra is forced to ask her father for help. While Gersinho and Leide are happy to meet Lourenço, Cassandra is shaken by the reunion, and her idealized view of her mother begins to crumble.

episodes.name: The traditional Brazilian mess
episodes.overview: In São Paulo, Cassandra goes back to her family of choice and resumes her frantic work life. She also meets with Ivaldo. Things aren't going so well with Vanusa, and Cassandra starts having trouble with the set list of her shows. In Morretes, Leide and Gersinho learn a lot as they spend time with Cassandra's father and his new wife.

episodes.name: Today we're having a show
episodes.overview: Leide and Gersinho return to São Paulo, but the boy won't live where he wanted. Cassandra agrees to pick him up from school every day. Ivaldo takes his daughter Ivana to meet Cassandra at the Metamorphosis bar.

episodes.name: Head up high or dead, never on my knees
episodes.overview: Cassandra's motorcycle breaks down and she must find an alternative transportation to make the deliveries. To help her friend, Roberta proposes that Cassandra work as a bartender. Leide and Gersinho plan his birthday party. While trying to sell her car, Leide receives an unexpected proposal. In order to get money, Cassandra needs to sell something valuable.

episodes.name: Sing, sing...
episodes.overview: Cassandra continues to work as a bartender at the Metamorphosis bar, but the financial problems keep going. She needs to find a way out and calls Gersinho to help her. Leide is great with her new job. Décio has his first solo show.

episodes.name: This can't be all there is to life
episodes.overview: With a new motorcycle, Cassandra tries to make up for lost time and money to go to her son's party. Gersinho uses his gift money to buy Cassandra a present. She introduces her son to her chosen family. For the first time, Cassandra considers looking for her mother.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Cassandra reunites with her father after a decade, and finds a loving man eager to reconnect with his daughter and her new family. As her beliefs fade into thin air, she will try to figure out what kind of woman, mother, daughter and girlfriend she wants to be. During this search, Gersinho, the boy who caused the tsunami in her life, will also be her life boat and source of joy.
